mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info (room_name, room_type, room_capacity, price_per_night, room_desc, create_datetime, update_datetime) VALUES (#{roomName}, #{roomType}, #{roomCapacity}, #{pricePerNight}, #{roomDesc}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO room_img (room_no, origin_file_name, file_name, file_ext, file_type, create_datetime, update_datetime) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{originFileName}, #{fileName}, #{fileExt}, #{fileType}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT room_no roomNo, room_name roomName, room_type roomType, room_capacity roomCapacity, room_desc roomDesc, price_per_night pricePerNight, create_datetime createDatetime, update_datetime updateDatetime FROM room_info

SELECT room_img_no roomImgNo, room_no roomNo, origin_file_name originFileName, file_name fileName, file_ext fileExt, file_type fileType, create_datetime createDatetime, update_datetime updateDatetime FROM room_img

SELECT room_no roomNo, room_name roomName, room_type roomType, room_capacity roomCapacity, room_desc roomDesc, price_per_night pricePerNight, create_datetime createDatetime, update_datetime updateDatetime FROM room_info WHERE room_no = #{roomNo}
